Class ServletEncodingProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.servlet.autoconfigure.ServletEncodingProperties
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.servlet.encoding") public class ServletEncodingProperties extends Object
@ConfigurationProperties for Servlet encoding.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Andy Wilkinson
